column.name: LONG_CALL_INTERVAL
column.comment: The interval in minutes that calls should be interrupted for manual extension. Default should be 0.

column.name: MAX_REDIALS_ALLOWED
column.comment: The maximum number of redials allowed for a session. Default should be 0.

column.name: ALLOW_MULTIPARTY_CALLING
column.comment: Flag indicating whether multiparty calling (3 or more participants) is allowed.

column.name: ACCESS_NUM_RATING_FLAG
column.comment: T/F flag indicating whether calling rates are based on service only or on the combination of service and access number.

column.name: PRECALL_ROUNDING_FLAG
column.comment: T/F flag indicating whether rounding is factored into the calculation that determine the time allowed for the call. If T, allowed call duration is rounded down to the next rounding increment. If F, rounding is not factored into announced call duration.

column.name: PARTIAL_BONG_CHARGE_FLAG
column.comment: T/F flag indicating whether the system will cut a call off at one second prior to a bong charge that cannot be paid for (F) or will set the allowed call duration to the time of the bong charge and charge a partial bong charge = whatever balance remains (T)

column.name: CLICK_TO_DIAL_FLAG
column.comment: Indicates whether the click to dial feature is enabled for this service.

column.name: TWO_STAGE_DIAL_FLAG
column.comment: Indicates whether two stage dialing is enabled for this service.

column.name: SINGLE_STAGE_DIAL_FLAG
column.comment: Indicates whether single stage dialing is enabled for this service.

column.name: MSG_INITIATED_CALLBACK_FLAG
column.comment: Indicates whether message initiated callback is enabled for this service.

column.name: ACCESS_NBR_INIT_CALLBACK_FLAG
column.comment: Indicates whether access number initiated callback is enabled for this service.

column.name: IVR_INITIATED_CALLBACK_FLAG
column.comment: Indicates whether IVR initiated callback is enabled for this service.

column.name: LAST_CALL_REDIAL_FLAG
column.comment: Indicates whether the service supports last call redial.

column.name: DIRECT_CALL_FLAG
column.comment: Indicates whether the service supports the direct call feature.

column.name: ALLOW_ZERO_COST_FLAG
column.comment: T - permits prepaid subscribers to make calls when the current prepaid balance is less than minimum required prepaid balance - or zero.

column.name: MAX_PARTIES
column.comment: If multiparty calling is allowed, max number of call legs.

column.name: CALL_MARKUP_PERCENT
column.comment: This is the global postcall markup that is applied to the total call cost.

column.name: WARNING_THRESHOLD_1
column.comment: time remaining in seconds at which application will play the first warning threshold prompt

column.name: WARNING_THRESHOLD_2
column.comment: time remaining in seconds at which application will play the second warning threshold prompt

column.name: WARNING_THRESHOLD_3
column.comment: time remaining in seconds at which application will play the third warning threshold prompt

column.name: ROUNDING_THRESHOLD
column.comment: calls less than this number of seconds will not be subject to postcall rounding
